Keys.Name: ZoomIn:FullViewCompass
Keys.Description: Hold to zoom in; double tap for full view.

Keys.Name: ZoomOut:SettingScroll
Keys.Description: Hold to zoom out; double tap for setting scroll.

Keys.Name: ToggleIconFrustrum:ToggleEffects
Keys.Description: Tap once to toggle Frustrum Calling; double tap to toggle effects on/off.

Sections.Name: CompassGraphicsSettings
Sections.Description: Setup what the compass appears, including what effects appear.

Keys.Name: EquippableCompass
Keys.Description: Do you want the compass to be an item that must be equipped to use?

Keys.Name: EnableBloodEffect
Keys.Description: Blood covers compass when taking damage to your chest. Armor/clothing reduce this damage. Rain cleans it.

Keys.Name: CompassBackgroundImageEnabled
Keys.Description: Does the compass background show endless dwemer gears or your choosen color?

Keys.Name: CompassBackgroundColor
Keys.Description: What color is the compass background? If you want default gear colors, set to color white.

Keys.Name: CompassBackgroundBrightness
Keys.Description: How bright do you want the background color/texture? Defaults to 50% so overlay is still easy to see.

Keys.Name: CompassBackgroundTransperency
Keys.Description: How transperent do you want the color/image of the compass background to be?

Keys.Name: EnableDamageEffect
Keys.Description: The glass will fracture and then break the more damage the compass takes. This creates a repair kit and items to repair damage.

Keys.Name: EnableWaterDropEffect
Keys.Description: When raining or swimming, water droplets hit your compass and slide down it. Disabling this does not disable rain cleaning effect.

Keys.Name: EnableMudEffect
Keys.Description: Mud collects on your compass based on how much you move, the season, the region, the weather, and the climate. Rain cleans it.

Keys.Name: EnableDirtEffect
Keys.Description: Dirt will collect on your compass based on how much you move, the season, the region, the weather, and the climate. Rain cleans it.

Keys.Name: EnableDustEffect
Keys.Description: Dust will collect on your compass based on how much you move, the season, the region, the weather, and the climate. Rain cleans it.

Keys.Name: EnableFrostEffect
Keys.Description: Frost will grow based on the season, the region, the weather, and the climate. Rain cleans it. Going inside fades it away.

Keys.Name: EnableMagicTearEffect
Keys.Description: Magical tears will appear when your grass breaks open. The more glass lost, the more magic tries to escape causing tears.

Keys.Name: FrameUpdateIntervals
Keys.Description: What frame interval at 60 fps should the effects update. Higher numbers = better performance, but the choppier effect is.

Sections.Name: CompassEffectSettings
Sections.Description: Setup how the effects operate in game..

Keys.Name: GlassTransperency
Keys.Description: How frosted do you want the glass? lower values the clearer the glass.

Keys.Name: FrostFadeIn
Keys.Description: How many seconds for the frost effect to fully appear? Seasons, climate, & weather affect this.

Keys.Name: MudLoopTimer
Keys.Description: How many seconds until a chance for mud on your compass? Seasons, climates & weather affect this.

Keys.Name: DirtLoopTimer
Keys.Description: How many seconds for random dirt check on your compass? Seasons, climates, & weather affect this.

Keys.Name: DustFadeIn
Keys.Description: How many seconds for dust effect to fully appear? Seasons, regaions, & weather affect this.

Keys.Name: MaxBloodDamageTrigger
Keys.Description: What percentage of health lose before the blood effect does a random check? Random check is (this number * .25f) to this number.

Keys.Name: MaxRainDrops
Keys.Description: How many droplets appear on the compass at a time. More droplets cost more fps. Turn this down if having low fps issues.

Keys.Name: WaterDropletInterval
Keys.Description: How quickly or slowly will droplets appear on compass. Lower the number the faster they will appear randomly.

Keys.Name: NpcCellUpdateInterval
Keys.Description: How often do you want a cell scanned for new npcs to add markers too. Lower the time, the higher the cpu demand.

Keys.Name: NpcMarkerUpdateInterval
Keys.Description: How often should npc markers be checked for detection? Higher numbers = less demand but slower marker detection.

Keys.Name: BuildingIconSpawnTime
Keys.Description: How long for building icons to appear. The longer it takes, the less fps stalls on town creations. 1 second default.

Keys.Name: IconFrustrumCalling
Keys.Description: Building icons are only enabled/rendered when in camera view. Only recommended for high cpu/low gpu comps.

Keys.Name: SmartViewTriggerDistance
Keys.Description: How far away zoom is before smart view settings flips building labels to icons?
